message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.
Alice, your offer was a bit one-sided. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split.
Let's find a middle ground. I'll take 55% and you get 45%.  This is a more balanced split than before.
Alice, we're wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome here. Let's end this.
